channel.title: Hunter the Reckoning : Shadows in Munich
channel.description:
**Hunter the Reckoning** : Shadows in Munich **Location** : Munich, Germany - 2015 **Genre** : Investigation/Rival Factions/Action. **Touchstones** : Being Human, Dresden Files, Lost Girl, Neverwhere, Rivers of London.
**Sessions** : https://app.playabl.io/games/59
This is part of a series, attendance at more than one session is prefered but not mandatory.
Previous experience with World of Darkness is not required.
- No Racism, Sexism or Homophobia. - X-Card will be available. - This series will be recorded for youtube (you can use profile pic if you don't want the camera on).
Excel Characters - https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1lxaQbXBtJccCpA1JBHBWZS-jDYrOGZUs/edit?usp=sharing&ouid=106479707653253486950&rtpof=true&sd=true
Edges/Advantages/Flaws - https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1zYSXQ6s_0J5fdj39Rhivj7CXMF8J9qBk
